mapper.sql: id, order_id, pick_no, warehouse_no, pick_time, weight, volume, total_carton, address_id, create_time
mapper.select: select t.id,t.order_id,t.pick_no,t.warehouse_no,t.pick_time,t.weight,t.volume,t.total_carton,t.address_id,t.create_time, t1.contacts,t1.phone,t1.country_code,t1.country_name,t1.state_code,t1.state_name,t1.city_code,t1.city_name,t1.region_code,t1.region_name,t1.address from order_pick t LEFT JOIN delivery_address t1 on t1.id = t.address_id where order_id = #{orderId}

select t.id, t.order_id, t.pick_no, t.pick_status, t.warehouse_no, t.pick_time, t.assign_pick_time, t.weight, t.volume, t.total_carton, t.remark, t.address_id, t.create_time, t.transport_id, t1.contacts, t1.phone, t1.country_code, t1.country_name, t1.state_code, t1.state_name, t1.address, concat(t1.country_name,' ',t1.state_name,' ',t1.address) as pickAddress, t2.order_no, t2.store_goods_warehouse_code shippingWarehouseCode, t2.store_goods_warehouse_name shippingWarehouseName, t3.company customerName, t4.jc_time, t5.transport_no, t6.company_name supplierName from order_pick t left join delivery_address t1 on t1.id = t.address_id left join order_info t2 on t2.id = t.order_id left join customer t3 on t3.id = t2.customer_id left join offer_info t4 on t4.id = t2.offer_info_id left join transport t5 on t5.id = t.transport_id left join supplier_info t6 on t6.id = t5.supplier_id where 1=1 and t.transport_id = #{transportId}

select pick_no, warehouse_no, pick_status, (case pick_status when 1 then '未提货' when 2 then '正在提货' when 3 then '已提货' when 4 then '已到仓' else null end) as pickStatusDescribes from order_pick where order_id = #{orderId}
